##### FILE: nginx-pod-https.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/fortune-https:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: fortune-https
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: INTERVAL
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: sleep-interval
          name: fortune-config
    image: edwin/fortune:v3
    name: html-generator
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/htdocs
      name: html
  - image: nginx:alpine
    name: web-server
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    - containerPort: 443
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: html
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
      name: config
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/nginx/certs/
      name: certs
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: html
  - configMap:
      items:
      - key: nginx.conf
        path: https.conf
      name: nginx-tls-config
    name: config
  - name: certs
    secret:
      secretName: fortune-https

---

##### FILE: nginx-pod-nfs.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/nfs-pv:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: nfs-pv
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 10Gi
  mountOptions:
  - hard
  - nfsvers=4.1
  nfs:
    path: /nfs-share/kubernetes/html
    server: 192.168.0.96
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Recycle
  storageClassName: nfs
  volumeMode: Filesystem

---

##### FILE: nginx-pod-pv_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-azuredisk:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-azuredisk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - printenv > /mnt/azuredisk/printenv.txt; while true; do echo $(date) >> /mnt/azuredisk/outfile;
      sleep 60; done
    image: nginx
    name: nginx
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/azuredisk
      name: azuredisk01
  nodeSelector:
    kubernetes.io/os: linux
  volumes:
  - name: azuredisk01
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: pvc-azuredisk

---

##### FILE: nginx-pod-readiness-health.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    readinessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 15
      periodSeconds: 10
      successThreshold: 1
      timeoutSeconds: 5

---

kind: Pod

  name: nginx-pod-using-pvc-nfs
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:alpine
    name: web-server
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: web-server-datadir
  volumes:
  - name: web-server-datadir
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongodb-pvc-nfs

##### FILE: nginx-preprovisioned-lb.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/exposed-nginx-preprovisioned-lb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: exposed-nginx-preprovisioned-lb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: exposed-nginx-preprovisioned-lb
  serviceName: ""
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: exposed-nginx-preprovisioned-lb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/listener
          name: listener
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      annotations:
        listeners.kubedoop.dev/listener-name: exposed-nginx-preprovisioned-lb
      name: listener
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteMany
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1
      storageClassName: listeners.kubedoop.dev

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-probe:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /404
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 5
      successThreshold: 1
      timeoutSeconds: 1
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-probes.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-probes:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    role: web
  name: nginx-probes
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    livenessProbe:
      initialDelaySeconds: 20
      periodSeconds: 20
      tcpSocket:
        port: 80
    name: nginx-probes
    readinessProbe:
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 10
      tcpSocket:
        port: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-probes-exemplos.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.2
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: nginx-prometheus.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  app: nginx
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels: null
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/nginx_status
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.10.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: nginx-proxy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/nginx-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-proxy
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Europe/Oslo
        image: nginx:1.25.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 9090
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-proxy
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/.htpasswd
          name: nginx-proxy
          readOnly: true
          subPath: .htpasswd
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
          name: nginx-proxy
          readOnly: true
          subPath: index.html
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx-proxy.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          - key: index.html
            path: index.html
          - key: _htpasswd
            path: .htpasswd
          name: nginx-proxy
        name: nginx-proxy

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: nginx-rc
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: nginx-rc12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: nginx-rc
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    app: mynginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mynginx
      name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/nginx-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: nginx-rc
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    app: nginx-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-app
      name: nginx-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

      name: nginx-pod

##### FILE: nginx-readiness.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.2
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.25
            memory: 128Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: nginx-readiness2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-silvestrini:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-silvestrini
  name: app-silvestrini
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-silvestrini
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-silvestrini
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mrsilvestrini/app-silvestrini:v1.0.0
        name: app-silvestrini
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 9001
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: nginx-readiness3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx-deployment
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment

      - image: nginx:1.19.2

            - -f

          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 5

            memory: 256Mi
          requests:

##### FILE: nginx-ready.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 80

##### FILE: nginx-recreate.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-nginx
    tier: frontend
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-nginx
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-nginx
      name: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.18
        name: my-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-replicaset13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.17.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 64Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/nginx-replicaset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-app
  name: nginx-replicaset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.2
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 126Mi

---

metadata:
  labels:
    appp: nginx
    type: front-end
  name: nginx-replication-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
        type: front-end
      name: ngxinx-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: services
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
      name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - infinity
        command:
        - sleep
        image: docker.io/library/nginx:latest
        name: nginx
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: docker-io

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https

##### FILE: nginx-resource-limit_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-web-svc
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
          name: nginx-index-file
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: index-html-configmap
        name: nginx-index-file

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: nginx-rollingUpdate.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/todo-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch09
  name: todo-proxy
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 90
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: todo-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: todo-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.18-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /data/nginx/cache
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: todo-proxy-configmap
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-nginx
    tier: frontend
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-nginx
      name: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.18
        name: my-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: nginx-rs
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: tier
      operator: In
      values:
      - frontend
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-app

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-app
        tier: frontend
      name: nginx-pod

        name: nginx-container

##### FILE: nginx-rs-match_expression.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - nginx
    - key: env
      operator: In
      values:
      - prod
      - qa
      - dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
        env: prod
      name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

metadata:
  name: nginx-rs-match-expression
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - nginx
    - key: env
      operator: In
      values:
      - prod
      - qa
      - dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
        env: prod
      name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

        type: Utilization

##### FILE: nginx-scratch-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-volume:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    run: nginx-volume
  name: nginx-volume
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx-volume
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /scratch
      name: scratch-volume
  - args:
    - while true; do echo $(date) >> /scratch/date.log; sleep 1; done
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    image: busybox
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /scratch
      name: scratch-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 500Mi
    name: scratch-volume

---

##### FILE: nginx-secret6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    - containerPort: 443
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 128Mi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
      name: nginx-config-volume
      subPath: nginx.conf
    - mountPath: /etc/nginx/tls
      name: nginx-tls
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: nginx-config
    name: nginx-config-volume
  - name: nginx-tls
    secret:
      items:
      - key: tls.crt
        path: certificado.crt
      - key: tls.key
        path: chave-privada.key
      secretName: meu-servico-web-tls-secret

---

##### FILE: nginx-secure-app_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: my-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bprashanth/nginxhttps:1.0
        name: nginxhttps
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl
          name: secret-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: configmap-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: nginxsecret
      - configMap:
          name: nginxconfigmap
        name: configmap-volume

---

kind: Service

    run: my-nginx

  namespace: default

    port: 8080
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80

    protocol: TCP
  selector:
    run: my-nginx
  type: NodePort

##### FILE: nginx-secure-app1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: my-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bprashanth/nginxhttps:1.0
        name: nginxhttps
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl
          name: secret-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: configmap-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: nginxsecret
      - configMap:
          name: nginxconfigmap
        name: configmap-volume

---


Mutation:

kind: Service
metadata:

    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-backend-protocol: http
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-ssl-cert: <인증서 arn>
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-ssl-ports: https
  name: gyeongnam-nginx-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80
  - name: https
    port: 443
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    app: gyeongnam-nginx
  type: LoadBalancer

##### FILE: nginx-service-loadbalancer.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/nginx-service:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - nodePort: 30008

    targetPort: 80

kind: Service

##### FILE: nginx-s-loadbalancer.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/nginx-s-l:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-s-l
  namespace: default
spec:
  externalIPs:
  - 192.168.1.199
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 8080
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    app: nginx
  type: LoadBalancer

---
